raw_text: Note. This is a joke. My kids go outside. They also know how to wear a mask around strangers at age 4 and 2. #WearAMask

I am feeling hugely discouraged about the idiocy in this country. It’s really bringing me to a very low place. A woman at the store who was ringing up my groceries who I love to chat w/ just told me masks are a conspiracy by the dems... WTF?! #ScienceMatters #WearAMask #StayHome

We’re still “flattening the curve” folks. And masks are simply a preventative to spreading the most contagious and rapidly spreading virus our planet has known. It’s not about your freedom your masculinity or your politics. Don’t take it personally #JustDoIt #WearAMask please
